name: finalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of making a final and certain decision about a plan, date, etc: the finalization of negotiations Finalization of the agreement was first reported online. See
finalize
More examplesFewer examplesThe rescue plan for the region was reported to be near finalization.Despite the contract's finalization, residents continue to question the financial fitness of the plan. Draft invoices allow review and finalization of the bill prior to printing.
